Articles.Content: Once your space/air craft has been built there is no turning back after a launch. It makes me feel like I am cheating.
You can change a setting in the save file to enable this; I don't recall this off-hand.
I'd like to see a "this is for real" or "this is only a simulation" launch option. One would be to test new craft. The other would be to do a mission which could earn flight credit.

This was brought up when Revert Flight was first implemented, I believe HarvesteR's thoughts on it were that if you chose simulation mode, and successfully got into orbit, you wouldn't want to do that again "for real this time".

And remember, you can't revert flight after you leave to the space centre or switch to another craft for the first time.
